overview: Lord Hubert Sunderthal, one of the richest men in the world, has fallen head over heals for Helena, a young model who resists marrying him due to the fact that his wife Anais, a pure and devote Catholic, is completely against the idea of divorce. Faced with this dilemma, Sunderthal contracts Mike Stern, a famous gigolo from Monaco, who is to get rid of his wife, making it look like an accident. This latest thriller is a delicious cocktail of beautiful and exciting girls, dream castles and wonderful cars. A film in which, without a doubt, you can enjoy the most sublime beauty as well as the hardest sex scenes.
title: The Gigolo
